availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jewelry store and watchmakers in Louisville, Kentucky. Operated from 1851 to 1857. Partner(s): Eugene Michot and Louis Edward Michot.

ab.bibl:
"Robberies," Daily Courier, (Louisville, KY), 16 Jul 1851, p. 3.
"Notice," Daily Courier, (Louisville, KY), 28 Jul 1857, p. 3.
"Jewelry Store- Fine Watches." Daily Courier, (Louisville, KY), 7 Dec 1860, p. 3.
Marquis Boultinghouse, Silversmiths, Jewelers, Watch and Clock Makers of Kentucky, 1785-1900, (Lexington: Marquis Boultinghouse, 1980), p. 204.
